Uses of Package
net.xqhs.flash.core.shard

  • Packages that use net.xqhs.flash.core.shard 
    Package Description
    example.compositePingPong
    The scenario of two agents which ping messages between them (one sends and one replies).
    net.xqhs.flash.core.composite
    The package contains classes related to the implementation ofCompositeAgent.
    net.xqhs.flash.core.control  
    net.xqhs.flash.core.monitoring  
    net.xqhs.flash.core.node
    The package contains classes needed for easily deploying Flash agents.
    net.xqhs.flash.core.shard
    The package contains interfaces and abstract classes for core agent features.
    net.xqhs.flash.core.support
    Core classes dealing with support items, such as communication and mobility.
    net.xqhs.flash.gui
    Classes related to automatic GUI generation.
    net.xqhs.flash.local
    Package that offers support for local communication.
    net.xqhs.flash.swingGui  
    net.xqhs.flash.webSocket  
  • Classes in net.xqhs.flash.core.shard used by example.compositePingPong 
    Class Description
    AgentShard
    A shard (also called a component) is characterized by its functionality, identified by means of its designation -- an instance of AgentShardDesignation.
    AgentShardCore
    This class serves as base for the implementation of agent shards.
    AgentShardGeneral
    The class extends AgentShardCore and offers additional functionality for AgentShard implementations, especially in working together with other (known types of) shards.
    ShardContainer
    This interface should be implemented by any proxy to an agent which needs to use AgentShards.
  • Classes in net.xqhs.flash.core.shard used by net.xqhs.flash.core.composite 
    Class Description
    AgentShard
    A shard (also called a component) is characterized by its functionality, identified by means of its designation -- an instance of AgentShardDesignation.
    AgentShardDesignation
    Implementation for shard designations.
    ShardContainer
    This interface should be implemented by any proxy to an agent which needs to use AgentShards.

  • Classes in net.xqhs.flash.core.shard used by net.xqhs.flash.core.shard 
    Class Description
    AgentShard
    A shard (also called a component) is characterized by its functionality, identified by means of its designation -- an instance of AgentShardDesignation.
    AgentShardCore
    This class serves as base for the implementation of agent shards.
    AgentShardDesignation
    Implementation for shard designations.
    AgentShardDesignation.StandardAgentShard
    Enumeration of standard shard names / functionalities.
    AgentShardGeneral
    The class extends AgentShardCore and offers additional functionality for AgentShard implementations, especially in working together with other (known types of) shards.
    ShardContainer
    This interface should be implemented by any proxy to an agent which needs to use AgentShards.
